name: Marketing Writer / Content Creator
description:
What do we do?

Improvado.io is a rapidly-growing data-driven US startup funded by more than 60 well-known VCs and funds in Silicon Valley. We’ve managed to raise $9 million in investments and now we’re growing up to 300% annually, setting new sales records.

Our product is a cloud-based SaaS-platform for marketers that allows us to easily aggregate data from 180+ advertising platforms like Instagram, YouTube, Facebook Ads, and GA into one place. We automate up to 90% of manual work related to reporting. One and a half billion records a day pass through Improvado and the storage size reaches ten terabytes...that’s why we’re so focused on up-to-date, high-load technologies.

Our HQ is in Silicon Valley (San-Francisco) with engineering offices in Tomsk and Moscow and already work with huge enterprises from the USA, Europe, and Asia like Coca-Cola, ASUS, Ancestry, Chacka Marketing, Monster Energy etc.

Our expertise in data aggregation has led our product to be high-ranked as a recommended middleware for marketers and data analysts (Yandex’s list for example). Due to our fast growth, we’re looking for the most talented engineers and other specialists able to contribute to our high-tech product development and to be a part of our cool international team.

Job brief

Our Marketing team is growing and we’re searching for a puzzle we’ve missed - a creative content writer with a high level of empathy and passion for storytelling.

We are looking for an experienced Marketing Writer/Content Creator who will work closely with the Marketing, Product, Design, and Customer Success team to create educational and promotional materials about product features, use cases, stories, and more.

As a content contributor at Improvado, you will work on creating content for Improvado products. You will cover the full cycle of content creation - from generating and validating ideas, keyword research and SERP analysis, competitors’ content research, to maintaining a massive library of content: from sales forms, case studies to advertising and customer interviews.

About you:

  • native/fluent in English (American) speaker,
  • excellent storytelling and communication skills,
  • experience in writing all sorts of content - landing pages, blogs, and sales collateral content is a must,
  • proven record of professional writing experience in Technology, SaaS,
  • ability to prioritize and manage own projects,
  • self-motivated, passioned about BI products,
  • experience working with CMS and content marketing design tools,
  • basic design skills,
  • ability to work on deadlines independently,
  • analytical skills to track content performance, experience working with Google Analytics, SEMrush, Surfer SEO, or similar tools.

Responsibilities:

  • manage the content creation process from the idea to promotion and optimization;
  • produce compelling, clear marketing communications for distribution, ensure content consistency through different channels, speak our brand voice;
  • distribute content through corporate channels (including publishing it via CMS);
  • monitor content performance and improve results over time.

Preferred:

  • degree in English, journalism, communication, or related field.

If you are interested in working with us, please send us examples of your previous works. This is a remote position and you can work from any part of the world!

Advantages:

  • Flexible schedule
  • 100% remote work
  • Opportunity to get company stocks and to become a co-owner
  • A chance to get experience in a fast-growing VC-backed startup from Silicon Valley
